Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI provides feedback on everything whereas my teacher does not - due to the class or meeting environment they may give one piece of feedback and move on

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: The feedback from GenAI made me feel more confident as I knew exactly what to do to improve my work whereas the feedback from my teacher would be ok and ony give me a small push in the right direction.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: The feedback from GenAI is quicker to receive than the feedback from my teacher.
